Blog.post: C méga génial ! Maman a téléphoné à Marianne et on doit pouvoir aller o parc Astérix dans une semaine avec Guillaume et Elise !!!!! Je suis heureuse . C'est vraiment génial. J'espère que tt se passera pour le mieux et que je ne ferai que m'amuser. Je veux aussi y aller avec Camille et Camille, c'est un projet qui me tient à coeur, lol. La dernière fois que j'y suis allée, c'était en 6e, avec Camille, et c'est un des plus beaux jours de ma vie! "Joan of Arcadia" est vraiment belle, sur les photos de prom', on dirait Britney Spears pendant sa "jeunesse": urlLink *Joan

So, I got pics of Katie Leung: urlLink katie leung she doesn't really look like the drawing, does she ? What about this one of the Weasley twins huh ? they're my favorite characters ! urlLink Weasley twins

urlLink Cho Chang Bon ben vous vous savez que des milliers des filles ont auditionné en Grande Bretagne pour obtenir le rôle de Cho Chang et pouvoir jouer dans le quatrième film "Harry Potter and The Goblet of Fire" qui sortira en été 2004..Donc vous devez savoir que Cho a été choisie, elle se nomme Katie Leung, a 16 ans et vit à Glascow avec sa famille. Personnellement, je ne trouve pas qu'elle ressemble à l'image que je m'étais faite de Cho Chang, mais la production du film a dit qu'elle était parfaite et à mon avis, si elle a été sélectionnée parmi des milliers de filles, c'est qu'elle doit avoir le "truc".

Hi, I'm back to say to you to go check out my friend's skyblog on the net, well it's pretty cool for people who speak french...Merci ki Lysaley ? jte fais de la pub internationale.. CHECK OUT http://lysaley.skyblog.com XOXO urlLink www.witchaylin.com
Well, that's the first time I write in herre. All my friends had a blog, so I wanted to know what it is. But now I guess I already had one on Blurty.com See ya !

Nelly Furtado-Try All I know Is everything is not as it's sold But the more I grow, the less I know And I have lived so many lives Though I'm not old And the more I see, the less I know The fewer the seeds the more I sow Then I see you standing there Wanting more from me And all I can do is try Then I see you standing there Wanting more from me And all I can do is try I wish I hadn't seen all of the realness And all the real people are really not real at all The more I learn, the more I cry As I say goodbye to the way of life I thought I had designed for me Then I see you standing there Wanting more from me And all I can do is try Then I see you standing there I'm all I'll ever be But all I can do is try Try All of the moments that already passed We'll try to go back and make them last All of the things we want each other to be We never will be And that's wonderful, that's life And that's you, baby This is me, baby And we are, we are, we are, we are Free In our love We are free in our love
These are my "childhood friends" Guillaume and Elise, I am in the middle. So you can see what I look like, lol. urlLink Guillaume, me and Lisette as kids
urlLink Kate Bosworth She's fantastic! I really adore her! I luv her kind. Such a wonderful gurl. Here are pics I luv from ELLE mag: urlLink Elle mag.2 urlLink Elle mag
urlLink Red haired beauty
I'm hating them so much. They're not like friends sometimes. I feel like I don't have any. They're all in that storm of teenage. Awful. Dust on their souls. urlLink all falls down..
I'm so sad Kanye West died in a car crash two years ago. I knew it only today. So sorry. He's made so beautiful songs. And I do prefer "All falls down" which is incredible. I'm so sorry

Hey ladies, look at that guy; he's a Prince! ain't he ? Handsome on that pic, he looks better with short hair. By the way, he's been a model.. urlLink Chad M. Murray What about Kate ? You may think she's not very pretty on this pic but I LUV HER ! She's fantastic, wonderful, great. I'm glad she's dating O.Bloom, they're good together. urlLink Kate Bosworth

Waow! Fantastic! I have seen the trailer, and it loOks pretty good.I didn't use to like H.Duff but she's good in this movie, really. And "Chad Michael Murray is quite The Prince, huh ?" Charming, really. urlLink "A Cinderella Story"

I'm feeling so sad. I'm missing Canada more than everything else. I fell completely in love with this wonderful country. I'm missing the "je ne sais quoi" that pleased me so much. I'm dying to be somewhere else. There was something in the air that blown my mind. I'm needing it to be happy. It sounds like drama. But this is how I feel. I love you Canada.
